waste management.Description: Recycling is an important aspect of waste management as it involves the process of converting waste materials into reusable materials.
Composting is a method of waste management that involves the decomposition of organic waste materials to produce nutrient-rich compost.
Landfills are a common method of waste management where waste materials are disposed of in designated areas.
Proper management of hazardous waste is crucial in waste management to prevent harm to human health and the environment.
